ygData.subject: A question about the Tashania quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I know every detail of the quest to get the Tashania spell, but one part worries me. I am currently KOS to most faction groups in Neriak (even with Illusion:
ygData.messageBody:
I know every detail of the quest to get the Tashania spell, but one part
worries me. I am currently KOS to most faction groups in Neriak (even with
Illusion: Dark Elf and Benevolence) because of my religion (Erollisi Marr)
and a few unfortunate run-ins with the Neriak Guard population. One part of
the Tashania quest reqiuires that I see Mizr N'Mar in the Neriak Library to
get my glowing coin of Tash converted into a gleaming coin of Tash. Will I
be able to do this without dropping invis? Being invis is basically the
only way I can roam Neriak unmolested, and I am usure if initiating a trade
with an NPC will cause my invisibility to drop. I am pretty sure that would
be the case, and being killed by angry NPCs in the Neriak Library really
doesnt appeal to me...

I would appreciate some advice from anyone that has completed this quest.
Am I right to think that initiating a trade with an NPC will make you
appear? If so, does anyone know what faction group Mizr and the surrounding
NPCs belong to? And is there anyway that I can raise my faction with this
group? Any help would be appreciated :)


Timn the Enchanter
43rd level, Erollisi Marr
"There are some who call me . . . Timn?"



================================
Ean Travis

\\|//
(o o)
------o00o-(_)-o00o-----
"Someday your ship will come in
and you will be waiting at the airport."
-The Book of How, Vol. II:
